Commitment and expertise are the most important factors he is looking for in a judge, because they will have to work with the finalists five or six days a week throughout the competition. They also have to be competitive with each other, because the judges are competing, too. Each will be trying to guide his or her pupils to the grand prize. This will create a situation in which someone like Simon Cowell will be critiquing those mentored by another judge and being "extra nice

"Congressman Mike Pence is humbled by the encouragement he has received across Indiana and the country to seek higher office," spokesman Matt Lloyd said. He will continue to prayerfully consider counsel. Mike Pence , who represents the state's 6th district, also is widely mentioned as a candidate for Indiana governor, a post Sarah Palin Mitch Daniels must vacate at the end of his term because of term limits.
